Seirbhísí Fuinnimh agus Uisce
Natural gas can be used for domestic central heating, cooking, etc. Find out about connection to the network and the services that are available
Déanann an cháipeis seo cur síos ar na seirbhísí a thairiscíonn Bord Gais, an comhlucht reachtúil atá freagrach as soláthar, traiseoladh agus dáileadh gáis nádúrtha
Electricity services provided in Ireland, including information on voltage, domestic use, charges and services for people with disabilities and older people
Cuirtear eolas ar fáil faoi voltas, úsáid tí, táillí, agus tá eolas faoi sheirbhísí do dhaoine le míchumais agus daoine níos sine san áireamh
The various ways that water is supplied to homes and businesses
Na bealaí éagsúla a sholáthraítear uisce do thithe agus do ghnólachtaí

Details of the system of domestic water charges, which are currently suspended

Commission for Energy Regulation
An Coimisiún um Rialáil Fuinnimh
The regulator for the electricity and natural gas markets in Ireland is the Commission for Energy Regulation (CER)
Is é an rialtóir do mhargaí leictreachais agus gáis nádúrtha in Éirinn ná an Coimisiún um Rialáil Fuinnimh (CRF)
They also handle consumer complaints
Láimhseálann siad gearáin ó thomhaltóirí chomh maith
